nodes.text: The Branch-class vehicle, also known as the Czerka Corporation cruiser, was a class of cruiser used by the Czerka Corporation. The class was long and bulky with a sizable cargo bay, and had a crew of up to 10,000. One such ship was the Leverage, commanded by Meritt Col, which was deployed to Pijal a few years before the Invasion of Naboo.
The Branch-class appears in the 2019 novel Master & Apprentice, written by Claudia Gray.
